name: NotFoundError
message: The requested resources was not found

name: ForbiddenError
message: You are not allowed to perform this action

name: UnauthorizedError
message: There was an error with the authorization

name: TopicNotFoundError
message: The requested topic is not available or was not found

name: SubscriptionError
message: The device could not be subscribed to the topic

name: EndpointNotFoundError
message: The requested endpoint is not available or was not found

name: ConflictError
message: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the target resource
